diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $PK$ is $x+1$.
The length of the line $KJ$ is $x+10$.
The length of the line $MK$ is $x+8$.
The length of the line $LK$ is $x$.
Point $K$ lies on the line connecting $P$ and $M$.
Point $K$ also lies on the line connecting $J$ and $L$.
Point $K$ lies on the circle with center $O$ and radius $4.0$.
Point $M$ lies on the circle with center $O$ and radius $4.0$.
Point $J$ lies on the circle with center $O$ and radius $4.0$.
Point $L$ lies on the circle with center $O$ and radius $4.0$.
circle_instances: There is a circle with center $O$ and radius $4.0$.
